They play in the Southeast Division of the Eastern Conference of the National Basketball Association( NBA) and are currently coached by Stan Van Gundy . The franchise was founded in 1989 as an expansion franchise and has had such notable NBA stars as Shaquille O'Neal , Anfernee "Penny Hardaway, Grant Hill , and Tracy McGrady throughout its young history. No Second Thoughts Speaking in an interview with Diane Sawyer of ABC News earlier this week, Donald Rumsfeld put it this way: What you know today can help you unthink your thinking about tomorrow. It can't help you with things you were thinking about back then, he said. "Back then, there was reasonable confidence that[ Saddam Hussein ] had these weapons." Nor does Donald Rumsfeld register second thoughts about the Pentagon's crucial failure to capture Osama bin Laden in the battle of Tora
